Entry.name: F
Entry.value: Confirmation Of A Discussion Between Buyer And Sales Representative

Entry.name: G
Entry.value: Add Items To A Previous Change Transaction

Entry.name: H
Entry.value: Delete Items From A Previous Change Transaction

Entry.name: J
Entry.value: Replace All Dates Shown In A Previous Change

Entry.name: K
Entry.value: Replace Prices Shown In A Previous Change Transaction

Entry.name: L
Entry.value: Replace Restrictions (Conditions) At An Item Level Shown In A Previous Change

Entry.name: M
Entry.value: Replace Marketing Area Shown In A Previous Announcement

Entry.name: N
Entry.value: Change Having No Effect on Rates

Entry.name: O
Entry.value: Replace Restrictions (Conditions) At A Transaction Level Shown In A Previous Change

Entry.name: P
Entry.value: Replace Price Area Shown In A Previous Change

Entry.name: Q
Entry.value: Replace Previous Change Transaction Entirely Because of Multiple Kinds Of Changes Or To Make Changes Not Specifically Indicated By Another Code In This Data Element

Entry.name: R
Entry.value: Replace Allowance Rates Shown In A Previous Announcement
